name: Top Dog: A Football Story - GAM3002/GAM3003
name_original: Top Dog: A Football Story - GAM3002/GAM3003
description:
Group members: Mehdi Ahmadi, Juan Rodriguez, David Akwaeze

This is a mature, dialogue-based Football story game with gameplay elements.

 The Story is based on Matthew, a young, up & coming Football star. He must go through the trials and tribulations, betrayals and pain to get where he wants to be. The game features branching pathways as well as Dialogue options for player immersion and great story telling.

This is for the Middlesex University Game Design GAM3002/GAM3003 Final project module.

Any sounds or assets used are used for non-profit and are royalty-free. 

Our Github repository: 

https://github.com/theoriginalmedz/Football-Game---GAM3002
